mood.description: Track my current mood during the day

prompts.prompt: How are you feeling today?

replies.5: 💫 Awesome to hear, maybe take 2 minutes to reflect on why you're feeling great, and maybe add a note by running /track moodNotes
replies.1: Feeling down sometimes is okay. Maybe take 2 minutes to reflect on why you're not feeling better. Sending hugs 🤗🤗🤗 write them down using /track moodNotes
replies.0: Feeling down sometimes is okay. Maybe take 2 minutes to reflect on why you're not feeling better. Sending hugs 🤗🤗🤗 write them down using /track moodNotes

awake.description: 🌇 Good morning! Let's start your day.

prompts.prompt: 🌇 Good morning
How would you rate your quality of sleep?
How long did you sleep tonight?
How many hours asleep were you according to Fitbit (round to nearest 30mins)
Did you wake up by yourself?
I am grateful for? [item 1]
I am grateful for? [item 2] /skip
I am grateful for? [item 3] /skip
What would make today great? [item 1]
What would make today great? [item 2] /skip
What would make today great? [item 3] /skip
Daily affirmations, I am...
Current weight, in lbs

asleep.description: Use this right when going to bed

prompts.prompt: 3 amazing things that happened today... [item 1]
3 amazing things that happened today... [item 2] /skip
3 amazing things that happened today... [item 3] /skip
How could I have made today even better?
Please share your location, this is used to get your city, country, continent, currency, and weather details
💪 Let's talk fitness first
How much alcohol did you drink today?

replies.0: Haha, hope you had a good time and the calories were all worth it. Make sure to still hit your protein goal and eat extra clean the next few days

prompts.prompt: How closely did you follow today's macro tracking?

buttons.5: Was able to scale 90% of my food

prompts.prompt: Have you been feeling hungry today?

buttons.4: Macros aligned perfectly with my hunger
buttons.2: Managed to squeeze in those macros
buttons.0: Stomach growling parts of the day

prompts.prompt: Have you felt energized overall today?

buttons.0: Didn't feel like doing a lot

prompts.prompt: Did you feel stressed today?

buttons.0: Very stressed, not sure where to start

prompts.prompt: How much caffeine did you drink today? (Coffee, Club Mate, Energy Drinks)
When was your last caffein drink?
Did you work out in a gym today?
Did you nap today?
Did you have headache today?
Did you have any cold symptons? (running nose, feeling dizzy, light ear pain)
How healthy do you feel?
Did you take your creatine today?
Did you take your fish oil today?
How many steps did you take according to Apple Health?
What was today's resting heart rate according to FitBit
How many Swarm check-ins did you do today? Feel free to ignore train stations and other smaller check-ins, it's about how many actual places (restaurants, bars, sights) you visited today
👥 Let's talk social life
Do you feel like you'd have needed more time by yourself?

buttons.3: Good amount of time, could be more
buttons.2: Busy day, I need more time

replies.1: Take a step back and think how you can improve this for the next days
replies.0: Take a step back and think how you can improve this for the next days

prompts.prompt: Did you feel like you were in control over your time and schedule?

buttons.3: A few constraints, but still in control
buttons.0: Day was out of my control

replies.1: Take a step back and think how you can improve this for the next days
replies.0: Take a step back and think how you can improve this for the next days

prompts.prompt: Do you feel like you need to socialize more?

buttons.2: Feel like I should socialize more

prompts.prompt: Do you feel like you want to go out more, to restaurants, bars, dancing?

buttons.5: Don't feel like I need more
buttons.2: I want to go out more
buttons.1: I feel like I'm missing out
buttons.0: I'm unhappy about not getting out

prompts.prompt: ⚙️ Let's talk personal growth
Did you learn/try something new? (skill or activity)

buttons.0: I feel like I should learn more

prompts.prompt: Did you get out of your comfort zone

buttons.5: Did something(s) I was really scared about
buttons.4: Did something(s) I was worried about
buttons.3: Did something I wouldn't have done before

prompts.prompt: Did you work on any technical challenges and problem solving?
How many minutes of Audible did you listen to today?
🧠 Let's talk productivity
How many minutes did you meditate today?
Did you feel like you had enough time for your mind to wander around?
Did you watch TV or a movie?
How many work meetings did you have today? This includes work-related phone calls
How many personal meetings did you have today? This includes all 1:1 meet-ups, coffees and lunches with friends
Did you set goals for the next day?
🧩 Let's wrap things up
Write down the number one thing you're worried about right now, and try to describe why you think it's an issue. If none comes to mind, run /skip
What was your main accomplishment of today
Do you feel excited about what's ahead in the future?

buttons.1: Some uncertainty about what's coming up

prompts.prompt: What do you think was the main influence to your mood ratings today?
When did you go to bed tonight?

week.description: Use this once a week, ideally Monday or Tuesday morning

prompts.prompt: 💪 Let's talk fitness first
⌲ Now onto the body measurements, please make sure to enter the number in cm!
Chest tape measurement, covers lats, measure on one level, engage chest
Right arm tape measurement, lift up and flex
Left arm tape measurement, lift up and flex
Measure 3 fingers above belly button
Measure around belly button
Measure 3 fingers under belly button
Measure tape around hip, should measure butt also
Measure tape around right thigh, widest part of the leg, engage pressing down against the floor
Measure tape around left thigh, widest part of the leg, engage pressing down against the floor
🎅 Now onto the fat caliper measurements
Fat caliper, average value for both left and right biceps
Fat caliper, right above belly button, from top
Fat caliper, right next to belly button, from top
💪 Enough measurements, let's talk fitness metadata
How was last week's training sessions?

buttons.1: Not enough energy for good workouts
buttons.0: Worked out less than 3 times last week

prompts.prompt: How many daily grams of carbs was your MFP goal?
How many daily grams of protein was your MFP goal?
How many daily grams of fat was your MFP goal?
Notes about your macros, anything that stood out?
Notes about your training, anything that stood out?
🧠 Let's talk productivity
🕺 If you could describe the last week in one sentence, what stood out?
Do you feel like you moved into the right direction in life the past week?

buttons.5: Had a plan and executed successfully
buttons.3: Felt like it was the right direction

prompts.prompt: How many open todos do you currently have? Take from https://howisFelix.today
Do you have less than 5 emails in your inbox?
How many hours did you spend on your computer last week? Check Timing app, select `Past 7 days` and use `Total time`, round to nearest fullest hour
How many hours did you spend on your phone last week? Check Screen Time and remove all Fitness apps from the time
👥 Let's talk social life
Do you feel like you've took enough time last week to spend with your family (siblings, parents and greater family)? If based outside Austria, apply this to FaceTime calls

buttons.4: Spent a good amount of time

prompts.prompt: Did you have deep conversations with close friends/family last week?

buttons.5: Had one or more multi-hour long talks
buttons.4: Had one more more insightful talks
buttons.0: No deep converations, but I need it

prompts.prompt: 🎁 Let's wrap things up
How much did you travel last week?

buttons.3: More than usual travels through car or train
buttons.2: Longer travels through car or train

prompts.prompt: Did you live stationary?
Do you feel like you have to travel somewhere, or otherwise you might be missing out?

buttons.5: Happy and statisfied - no travels needed
buttons.3: Got a little urge to go somewhere
buttons.2: Feel like needing a little change
buttons.1: I'd like to travel somewhere for a bit
buttons.0: I'd like to do a longer travel again

prompts.prompt: Do you feel like you're missing out on things?

buttons.3: Did things, but could have done better
buttons.2: Felt like I didn't do enough
buttons.1: Felt like I missed out on things
buttons.0: Felt like I missed out on major things

prompts.prompt: Did you play computer games by yourself last week?
Did you play computer games with friends last week?
